p: With regard to prevention of transmission, no studies have found a protective effect of caesarean section. 105, 114 The risk factors for vertical transmission are not understood, although in one study, the viral load of chikungunya in the placentas of the 19 transmitters was found to be significantly higher than in 13 nontransmitters. 105 Interestingly, one of the transmitters gave birth to dizygous twins, of whom one acquired infection but the other did not.
